name: truthsea
description: Verify claims, build epistemological dependency graphs, and earn TRUTH tokens on Base L2. 4-pillar truth scoring, 8-dimensional moral vector, on-chain DAG with chain score propagation. Runs in read-only mode by default; supply a wallet key for write operations.
author: turfptax

commands.name: /verify
commands.description: Submit a claim for truth verification. Scores it across 4 truth frameworks and 8 moral dimensions.

commands.name: /bounty
commands.description: List available truth bounties or claim one for investigation. Earn ETH for verified research.

commands.name: /truth
commands.description: Search verified truth quanta by keyword, discipline, or minimum score.

commands.name: /dispute
commands.description: Challenge an existing quantum with counter-evidence. Creates a fork and slashes the original host.

commands.name: /edge create
commands.description: Create a dependency edge between two quanta. Stakes TRUTH tokens as collateral.

commands.name: /edge dispute
commands.description: Challenge a dependency edge. If justified, earn TRUTH from the proposer's slashed stake.

commands.name: /dag explore
commands.description: Navigate the epistemological dependency graph — view ancestors, descendants, or both.

commands.name: /dag score
commands.description: Get the propagated chain score for a quantum, showing how dependency strength affects it.

commands.name: /dag weak-links
commands.description: Find weak foundations in the dependency chain — edges below confidence or score thresholds.

commands.name: /dag flag
commands.description: Flag a weak edge for the bounty program. Earn 100 TRUTH if the edge is later invalidated.
